backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI-related footer updates and their associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of multiple frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling hash-based routing and rendering pages with header, footer, and WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/site/Appointment: Appointment form that collects user details and opens WhatsApp with a prefilled message.
frontend/src/components/site/CallLink.ts: Reusable phone link component rendering a tel: anchor with an icon.
frontend/src/components/site/FloatingWha: Floating action button that opens WhatsApp with a default message.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer with clinic info, quick links, and action buttons including fixed singleâ€‘icon WhatsApp and centered Get Directions.
frontend/src/components/site/GetDirectio: Button that opens Google Maps to the clinic address with centered icon and text.
frontend/src/components/site/GoogleMapEm: Embeds Google Maps iframe showing the clinic location.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, language toggle, logo, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/site/LanguageTog: Button that switches the app language between English and Hindi.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Wrapper component that renders a padded section with optional custom classes.
frontend/src/components/site/ThemePrimit: Basic UI primitives including Card, CardContent, and Container with styling wrappers.
frontend/src/components/site/WhatsAppLin: Button that opens a WhatsApp chat with a prefilled message using clinic phone info.
frontend/src/content/clinic.ts: Static clinic metadata including name, doctors, contact details, and hours.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Hook that sets the document title and description meta tag.
frontend/src/i18n/LanguageProvider.tsx: Context provider storing the current language and translation helper with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/i18n/strings.ts: English and Hindi translation strings for navigation, UI sections, and clinic content.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles and Tailwind config layers defining fonts, variables, utilities, and component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the main App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutDoctorsPage.tsx: Renders the About Doctors page with hero text, doctor profiles using translations, and visual sections using cards and images.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the Home page with hero content, services overview, testimonials, CTAs, and map embed using translated text.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesContactPage.t: Renders the Services & Contact page with hero section, services list, FAQs, and appointment/location components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind settings, theme extensions, colors, fonts, spacing, shadows, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Describes current project requirements, specs, known issues, and supported features for the site build.
